data.text:
Bronze & Platinum Lots

Bronze & Platinum Lots

There will be no changes made to the Sun Tan City Bronze or United Mechanical Platinum Lots for the upcoming season. Passes in these lots will remain physical passes that are mailed to Season Ticket Members.

To view maps and get driving directions to these lots, click the links below.

Mobile Parking

Mobile

All parking passes in the Planet Fitness Lots (ADA, Purple, Red, White, Green, and Yellow Lots) are digital this year.

Make sure you download your parking pass(es) before you head to the stadium on game day, and have your pass pulled up on your phone on Floyd Street. Your pass will be scanned before you are allowed entry into your lot.

You can manage your digital parking through the free CardsMobile app. Don't have the app? Click below to download on your mobile device.

Full step-by-step instructions on how to access and transfer your digital parking pass(es) are outlined below.

Step

01

Download and open CardsMobile on your device. On the home screen, tap the “Skip” option to bypass the customization log in and go directly to the app.

Step

02

Once in the app, tap the "Tickets" icon in the bottom nav.

Step

03

Sign in to your 'My Cardinals Account.' To complete login and be redirected to your account, tap "Sign In."

Step

04

Tap on an upcoming event and use the action buttons to view your parking pass(es).

Step

05

Click on "Add to Wallet" on each pass to save to your mobile device.

Step

06

When prompted with "CardsMobile Would Like to Add 1 Pass to Wallet" click "Add".

Step

07

Your pass is now ready to be viewed in your mobile wallet.

Step

08

Open your mobile wallet for easy access to your pass(es) and fast scanning at the lots on game day.

Planet Fitness Lots

Planet Fitness Lots

The Planet Fitness Lots have been reconfigured and divided into five lots, easily identifiable by color, to offer season ticket members a choice between speed and self-park options.

Speed Parking, available in the Purple Lot (includes ADA), will be parked on a first-come, first-served basis and is available only in that lot. Attendants will guide fans to the next available space upon arrival to the lot, filling the lot from north to south.

A new self-park option will be available this season in the White, Red, Yellow and Green Lots. These lots are smaller and allow fans to park in the parking space of their choosing within the lot.

Click the parking icons below to view the maps, inbound traffic patterns, and additional details for each lot.
